titleInfo.title: A conversational virtual human as autonomous assistant for elderly and cognitively impaired users? Social acceptability and design considerations
INFORMATIK 2013. Informatik angepasst an Mensch, Organisation und Umwelt, 16.–20. September 2013 Koblenz, Germany
